io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils

Class CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View extends StatelessView<ViewState>>

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectablePresenter<View>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarcodeCameraPresenter, BatchBarcodeListPresenter

    public class CrossViewStatePresenter<ViewState,View extends StatelessView<ViewState>>
implements ConnectablePresenter<View>

    Presenter which stores view state between io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$resume(View) and io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$pause() and applies the latest view state to the view on next io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$resume(View).

    See Also:
    io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$resume(View), io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$pause(), io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.CrossViewStatePresenter$resume(View)

    • Field Detail

      • state

        protected ViewState state

    • Method Detail

      • pause

        public void pause()

      • back

        public boolean back()

      • updateState

        public void updateState(ViewState state)

        Updates state of the current view or stores state until view is available.
